messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. From Wei what is the shortest path to Moin? Starting from Wei, please list the scholar names in order, including Wei, separated by commas.

First, identify the connections of Wei. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva.
Second, check the connections of Reza, Wim, and Eva to find a link to Moin. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Wim is connected to Jing. Eva is connected to Amy, Matt, Gia, and Prem.
Third, none of these scholars are directly connected to Moin, so check the connections of the scholars connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Jing is connected to Raj, Wei, Wim, Nisha, and Reza. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy.
Fourth, none of these scholars are directly connected to Moin, so check the connections of the scholars connected to Jing, Amy, Matt, Gia, and Prem. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei.
Fifth, none of these scholars are directly connected to Moin, so check the connections of the scholars connected to Raj, Nisha. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei.
